name: CRYPTODUUUDES for The NFT Magazine  #06 ISSUE 2K23

metadata.description:
In continuity with some recent works inspired by Plato's Allegory of the Cave, the artist Cryptoduuudes once again addresses the relationship between perception and reality with a narrative that prompts viewers to raise questions about the physical, virtual and digital worlds.

What, of what we perceive, is real and what is not?
Is it possible to attribute an illusory nature to human perceptions?

--------------

## Welcome to The first NFT Magazine to be read and collected on Ethereum!

**With this NFT Cover, you can access the exclusive **[READERS CLUB](https://www.thenftmag.io/about)** to read the content of The Digital Magazine.
**Also, you will be involved in decisions on the topics to be included, rankings, interviews, cover, and more of THE NFT MAGAZINE and participate in the [**"Readers Gallery" Drops**](https://www.thenftmag.io/readersgallery/) here on Nifty!**
metadata.name: #06 CRYPTODUUUDES 2K23 | The NFT Magazine #1/30
